mapper.select: SELECT Machine_Name as machine_name ,trim(Additional_Info_1) as Additional_Info_1 ,Shot_Number ,Injection_Time ,Filling_Time ,Plasticizing_Time ,Cycle_Time ,Barrel_Temperature_1 ,Barrel_Temperature_2 ,Mold_Temperature_1 ,Mold_Temperature_2 ,Mold_Temperature_3 ,Mold_Temperature_4 ,Mold_Temperature_5 ,Mold_Temperature_6 ,Cavity ,TimeStamp ,FORMAT(TimeStamp, 'HH:mm:ss') as shottime ,FORMAT(TimeStamp, 'yyyyMMdd') as shotdate FROM [ado_kd].[dbo].[shot_data] where TimeStamp between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(Machine_Name,'') Like concat(#{machine_name},'%') and isnull(trim(Additional_Info_1),'') Like concat(#{Additional_Info_1},'%') ORDER BY TimeStamp

SELECT Machine_Name, trim(Additional_Info_1) as Additional_Info_1, Mold_Temperature_1 as MT01 ,Mold_Temperature_2 as MT02 ,Mold_Temperature_3 as MT03 ,Mold_Temperature_4 as MT04 ,Mold_Temperature_5 as MT05 ,Mold_Temperature_6 as MT06 ,FORMAT(TimeStamp, 'HH:mm:ss') as shottime FROM [ado_kd].[dbo].[shot_data] where TimeStamp between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(Machine_Name,'') Like concat(#{machine_name},'%') and isnull(trim(Additional_Info_1),'') Like concat(#{Additional_Info_1},'%') ORDER BY TimeStamp
select machine_name from shot_data where isnull(machine_name,'') Like concat(#{machine_name},'%') group by machine_name order by machine_name
select Additional_Info_1 from shot_data where isnull(Additional_Info_1,'') Like concat(#{Additional_Info_1},'%') group by Additional_Info_1 order by Additional_Info_1
